alert.note: Alert for Johnson County Higher Elevations; Newton County Higher Elevations; Southern Johnson County (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 7:24PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Newton and northern Johnson Counties through 815 PM CDT... At 724 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles east of Cass, or 13 miles northeast of Ozark, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Walnut... Rosetta... Devils Knob... Oak Grove in Johnson County... Salus... Catalpa... Yale... Friley... Ozone... Fallsville... Oark... Dixon Ridge... Wolf Pen Campground... Arbaugh... Mineral Springs Recreation Area... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Johnson County Higher Elevations; Newton County Higher Elevations; Southern Johnson County
